document.full_text: a u.s. judge approved a class action settlement over google's buzz social network, and awarded $500,000 to an internet privacy group that had previously been left out of the proposed deal.
document.title: privacy group gets part of google settlement: judge
lines_and_colors: a u.s. judge approved a class action settlement over google's buzz social network, and awarded $500,000 to an internet privacy group that had previously been left out of the proposed deal.
